alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 3:26AM MST until November 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Lake County Below 11000 Feet and Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with slushy and snowpacked roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft
